column1: MRI size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section. The observation is made on slice n°101 from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4825.1953 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5289.2578 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 249.1699 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 3.9551 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 379.6875 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1551.7090 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 13.1836 mm³, the left putamen of volume 357.2754 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 102.8320 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 245.2148 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 133.1543 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 30.3223 mm³.
